classify.general
Interface Classifier

All Known Implementing Classes:
AlwaysPositiveClassifier, BinaryClassifier, HeterogeneousNaiveBayesClassifier, LogisticRegressionClassifier, NaiveBayesClassifier, PerceptronClassifier
public interface Classifier

An interface for classes which can learn a mapping from data examples to labels.

Method Summary
 Object getLabel(Example example)
          Get the label assigned to the example by this Classifier.
 Counter<Object> getLabelScores(Example example)
          Get the unnormalized log scores for each label.
 void train(List<Example> examples)
          Train this Classifier from a List of data examples.
